snippet.title: Release Trailer: The Perfect Woman
snippet.description:
#visualnovel #horrorgaming #indiegame

I've released "The Perfect Woman," a psychological horror game where you play as an AI girlfriend trapped by your creator, who wants to carve you into his ideal spouse. If you want to survive, you'll have to become "the perfect woman." 

You can find the game here: 

https://chattercap.itch.io/the-perfect-woman

Thank you to the voice cast: 
Michael Mishkin as "The Doctor"
Maganda Marie as "The Wife"
Justine Leah Hince as "The Statue"
Maria Corcobado as "The Woman"
Jingle Deleon as "Yumeko"

You can find my links here:
https://chattercap.carrd.co/
https://chattercap.itch.io/
https://www.patreon.com/chattercap
